Row.Text: A tall, beautiful and fruitful tree, around which your community has been founded. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Indicates this City is the [ICON_CAPITAL] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Capital[ENDCOLOR] of the empire, until the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Palace[ENDCOLOR].

The concept of a tree of life has been used in science, religion, philosophy, mythology, and other areas. A tree of life is a common motif in various world theologies, mythologies, and philosophies. A mystical concept alluding to the interconnection of all life on our planet; and a metaphor for common descent in the evolutionary sense. The term tree of life may also be used as a synonym for 'sacred tree'.[NEWLINE](Quoted from en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tree_of_life)

Being at the top-most point of soaring cliffs give you visibility over your tribe and the surrounding land. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Indicates this City is the [ICON_CAPITAL] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Capital[ENDCOLOR] of the empire, until the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Palace[ENDCOLOR].
Man starting understanding the concept of building their shelter or using the existing environment. The leader always takes the best spot, but in return, provides bonsues for his or her people.

Your personal luxurious, glorious and magnificent hut. Comes with a comfortable bed made of a big flat rock.[NEWLINE]May only be built once in a Civilization. Becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR] with the discovery of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Masonry[ENDCOLOR].
The Chieftain's Hut is the center of early human politics. Here you act as leader, judge and counsellor to your people.

Provides a crude form of shelter for your tribe, increasing [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Happiness[ENDCOLOR] in your community.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR] with the discovery of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Masonry[ENDCOLOR].

Provides a crude form of shelter for your tribe, increasing [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Happiness[ENDCOLOR] in your community.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR] with the discovery of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Masonry[ENDCOLOR].

The basic stick shelter is one of the most primitive of shelters, still in use today. Its great advantage was the portable nature of the core components. It could also be built almost anywhere. Simple to set up, it protects only against the basic elements.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Happiness[ENDCOLOR] for your community as they are able to shelter themselves from some environmental elements.

Settlements near marsh regions gain +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Production[ENDCOLOR] by building [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Causeways[ENDCOLOR]. Marshland resources also provide extra bonsues. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Production[ENDCOLOR] from [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Sugar[ENDCOLOR] and +1 [ICON_GOLD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gold[ENDCOLOR] from [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Truffles[ENDCOLOR]. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR] with the discovery of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Masonry[ENDCOLOR].
"The Dead Marshes, yes, yes: that is their name." [NEWLINE] - Little Green Guy[NEWLINE]
Build a causeway if you have marshland within your boundaries or are next to a river. This will increase your settlement's [ICON_PRODUCTION] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Production[ENDCOLOR].

Causeways have been build since the prehistoric times. They are a simple structure, requiring only manpower.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A Causeway is needed to ease transportation across swampy and marsh areas or small areas of pooled water or rivers. The basic principle is to stack rocks and earth and raise the level above the marsh or swamp. This provides easier transortation across these areas and access to resources in the bogged down area.

Increase [ICON_FOOD] Food production by 25% from [ICON_RES_DEER] [COLOR_YELLOW]Deer[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_YELLOW]Reindeer[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_YELLOW]Foul[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_YELLOW]Ape[ENDCOLOR], and [COLOR_YELLOW]Crocodile[ENDCOLOR] resources. Increases the [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Happiness[ENDCOLOR] and [ICON_GOLD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gold[ENDCOLOR] of your community.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A campfire never becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR].
"Governing a great nation is like cooking a small fish - too much handling will spoil it."[NEWLINE] - Lao Tzu[NEWLINE]

A campfire plays a central role in your early settlement. Build it to increase [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Happiness[ENDCOLOR] and provide additional [ICON_FOOD] Food bonuses to certain [ICON_FOOD}] resources. This double bonus and relative cost makes this building a great asset.

A campfire provided a place to gather, allowed for cooking, and gave warmth and comfort. It improved morale and unified the tribe, but at the same time, lead to more nefarious activities.[NEWLINE]By cooking their food, early man was able to transofrm their food in a way that provided slightly different nutritional value and a change in digestion, allowing for an increase in brain function and less of a need in the amount of food needed to sustain oneself.

Increases sanitation and provides +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for your community. Becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR] with the discovery of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Architecture[ENDCOLOR] or [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Sanitation[ENDCOLOR]. Requires no [ICON_GOLD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gold[ENDCOLOR] maintenance.
"What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas."[NEWLINE] - Noone[NEWLINE]

With the advent of gathering technologies, primitive humans started to settle in areas longer. Realizing that cross-contamination of foods and waste lead to disease and death, humans started to dispose of domestic waste in remote locations.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Middens (also called Shell Mounds or Shell Heaps) were composed of: bone; excerement; vermin; unusable domestic items like broken containers, broken arrows and arrowheads; rotten vegetation; and of course, shells.

Grants +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food but requires animal resources close to your settlement.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR] with the discovery of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Metal Casting[ENDCOLOR].
[NEWLINE]"It is better to have burnt and lost, then never to have barbecued at all." [NEWLINE]- Will [NEWLINE]

The fire pit was not only an effecient method of cooking food, but could also be used as a smoke pit to preserve meats for longer periods of time. Grants additional +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for your community.
The fire pit was not only an effecient method of cooking food, but could also be used as a smoke pit to preserve meats for longer periods of time.
Grants additional [ICON_FOOD] Food for your community.[NEWLINE]Becomes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Obsolete[ENDCOLOR] with the discovery of [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Pottery[ENDCOLOR].
The Food Storage is usually a cool cave or cavity, where food is kept fresh longer. Build it to increase the Growth of your City.
The Rock Paintings grant your community +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Rock Paintings increase your Civilization's [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Millennia later, archaeologists will be in awe of your amazing work.
Provides additional protection for your City.[NEWLINE]After constructing your Palace, receive a free Palisade in all Cities.
The Palisade is a simple, but effective City fortification. Build it to protect your community from enemy attacks.
